Package library.media

Class MediaManager

java.lang.Object
library.media.MediaManager
public class MediaManager extends Object
Manages a collection of media items (Books and CDs). Provides functionality to add, list, search, and find media.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jana

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MediaManager()
    Constructs a MediaManager with an empty media list.
    MediaManager(List<Media> mediaList)
    Constructs a MediaManager with a given media list.

      Finds a media item by its ID.

      Returns:
